ygData.subject: Website for local EQ kakis
ygData.msgSnippet: Browse through my temp directory and found 1634 messages related to the mailing list, 300+ which belongs to me....... WTF, did I really type out roughly 20% of
ygData.messageBody:
Browse through my temp directory and found 1634 messages related to the
mailing list, 300+ which belongs to me.......

WTF, did I really type out roughly 20% of the messages in this list???

Now onto the website thing, I need a damn space to jump this 1600+
e-mails too. Temp directory getting freaky bloated up.

Also, I need a place to post up the damn character sheet I have leh, Red
Dawn KKK(Kong Kah Kiao, ie. died) already izzt?

The location of some items I'm starting to forget liao, so all the item
locate I mention that is not on any site, please jot in down, in case I
need to refer to it again (I now like 100 year old orc, memory damn
terok)

Finally, I also have 100 screen shots in 5 folders, also need a damn
place to put them up. Included is one of the many "giant wisp" shots I
have.

Sereph, playing DDR while waiting for the server to come back.

"Ai yai yai, I'm a little butterfly. Green, Red and Blue makes the
colours in the sky....."
